dcterms:creator: Kota Dohi
Kota Dohi
Kota Dohi
dcterms:description: The DCASE 2022 Task 2 Development set consists of 10-second audio recordings collected from 7 machine types: 'Bearing', 'Fan', 'Gearbox', 'Slider', 'ToyCar', 'ToyTrain', and 'Valve'. It is used for evaluating models in the task of Acoustic Anomaly Detection of Machines.
dcterms:title: DCASE 2022 Task 2 Development set

dcterms:creator: Kota Dohi
Kota Dohi
Kota Dohi
dcterms:description: MIMII DG is a sound dataset designed for investigating and inspecting malfunctioning industrial machines, specifically for domain generalization tasks.
dcterms:title: MIMII DG

dcterms:creator: Noboru Harada
Noboru Harada
Noboru Harada
dcterms:description: ToyADMOS2 is a dataset of miniature-machine operating sounds aimed at anomalous sound detection under domain shift conditions.
dcterms:title: ToyADMOS2
